thread.title: ClickSoftware posts 3Q loss - Yahoo Singapore Finance
thread.title_full: ClickSoftware posts 3Q loss - Yahoo Singapore Finance

author: AP
title: ClickSoftware posts 3Q loss - Yahoo Singapore Finance
text:
PETACH TIKVA, Israel (AP) _ ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. (CKSW) on Wednesday reported a loss of $1.5 million in its third quarter. 
On a per-share basis, the Petach Tikva, Israel-based company said it had a loss of 4 cents. Losses, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were roughly breakeven on a per-share basis. 
The maker of human resources cloud computing software posted revenue of $31.2 million in the period. 
ClickSoftware expects full-year earnings in the range of 1 cent to 8 cents per share, with revenue in the range of $128 million to $133 million. 
ClickSoftware shares have decreased 6 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has dropped 2.5 percent in the last 12 months.
